column3: News;Phnom Penh: Residents found a dead Korean man hanging at 3:30 am on April 6
column5: along the road leading to the river near Chroy Changvar Primary School
column8: Phnom Penh.------The man was named as SUK HYUN KIM
column9: a 60-year-old Korean male.------According to local sources
column11: citizens were walking along the river bank
column12: when they arrived at the scene and saw the hanging man. They then reported to the local police.------The source added that forensic experts confirmed the death was self-inflicted and a case of suicide.------After the  examination
column13: the body was transported to Stung Meanchey pagoda and authorities contacted the Embassy of Korea.------Warning
